Finance Committee Meeting - Canceled

Please be advised that the Finance Committee Meeting scheduled for 11:00 AM on Tuesday, August 12, 2025, has been canceled.

Volunteer to Count Ballots

The ballot counting for the Board of Directors Elections is back on!  Join us on August 9, 2025, at 7:45 AM at the LACC Clubhouse. We are looking for FOUR dependable volunteers to assist with the ballot counting for the completion of the 2025 LACC Annual Elections. This is a vital part of maintaining a fair and transparent process. Your help would be greatly appreciated!
 
 If you are available to help, please contact Mike Sylvester at 775.250.7291.
 
Thank you for supporting your community!

Contact Mike Sylvester: 775.250.7291

Sports Center's Closing Date

Mark your calendars! The Sports Center will close for the season on its final day, Sunday, September 14, 2025. We encourage you to visit often until then to help us make their closing day a special and memorable event!

Sports Center

Lake Almanor Open

Heads up, golfers! While the Lake Almanor Open is now full, the Pro Shop is still open. Please feel free to check with us for any available tee times during the tournament.

Book Tee Time

Courage Triathlon

The event officially begins at 6:00 AM, though the race will not start until 10:00 AM. Please be mindful of participants on the road and in the water that day. Come out and support these racers who are raising awareness and funds for a cause we wish didn't exist. We are incredibly grateful for the events, groups, and courageous participants who provide safe houses and resources for child victims of sex trafficking.
